entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the twins who had been spying on the Slytherin team. He is described as being involved in an activity (spying) and having a specific role (reporting to Harry).

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the twins who had been spying on the Slytherin team. He is described as being involved in an activity (spying) and having a specific role (reporting to Harry).

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who had been at the practice session. He is described as coming across Nearly Headless Nick in the corridor.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is mentioned as a ghost of Gryffindor Tower. He is described as staring morosely out of a window and muttering under his breath.

entities.name: slytherin team
entities.description: The Slytherin team is mentioned as being fast and skilled at flying on their new broomsticks. They are described as shooting through the air like jump-jets.

relationships.description: Fred and George are mentioned as twins, indicating a sibling relationship.
Harry comes across Nearly Headless Nick in the corridor, indicating an encounter between the two.
Fred and George report on the speed of the Slytherin team, indicating that they observed them.
George reports on the speed of the Slytherin team, indicating that he observed them.
